title: More Than This
description: We started as friends. OpehliaI have a secret.I’m in love with my best friend.I have been for as long as I can remember.When he joined the military and left, he took my heart with him.He’s back now though and we picked up as friends again like no time had passed.There’s something different about him though. Something that I can’t quite put my finger on…GavinI have an obsession.It’s with my best friend.I’ve been in love with her for as long as I can remember but she’s only ever seen me as a friend.Or so I thought.Now that we’re living together, I’ve started to notice things.Like maybe I’m not the only one in love here.We started as friends, but after one drunken night, will we finally admit to each other how we feel?
author: Shaw Hart
